all_response:
Jax: To train your subordinates in magic casting, first you must arrange for a knowledgeable magic scholar to provide theoretical training and demonstration of fireball casting. Then, you must gift subordinates fire crystals, which are the source of energy for casting fire magic, so they can practice fireball magic in an open and safe place to master their skills.
Jax: You can go to the magic school and ask Angela, a renowned magic scholar, to guide your subordinates' training.
Jax: Angela, the magic scholar, resides at the King's Magic Academy.
Jax: Fire crystals can be purchased directly from Lillian Magic School. This school has a magic props store that is open to the public. Each fire crystal costs 100 gold coins.
Jax: You should have your subordinates practice fireball magic on Hill Prairie. Though open, Sunset Wasteland is too dangerous and Golden Coast is too crowded, and practicing there would risk the safety of your subordinates or others.

all_response:
Jax: To train your subordinates in first aid, first you must invite professional first aid trainers to provide theoretical training and demonstration of routines. Then the students should go to the virtual environment laboratory for practical training in a virtual setting. Finally, your subordinates must attend the emergency first aid skills assessment at 7 PM tomorrow night at the hospital.
Jax: You can go to the hospital and ask Doctor Henry to guide your subordinates' training. You have sufficient funds, so don't worry about the cost of training, just pay according to the professor's requirements.
Jax: Professor Henry works at King's Hospital.
Jax: You can take them to the National Virtual Reality Lab to gain experience treating first aid. This lab offers free practical training in a virtual environment.
Jax: Finally, you should let them take the assessment organized by St. Anne's Hospital. The assessment is free of charge. Please don't miss it.

all_response:
Jax: To improve your fireball magic, you should attend the free advanced fireball magic training held by the magic school tomorrow night at 8:00pm. After the training, you'll need to upgrade your fire crystals to sun crystals, and then go to the grassland to defeat three fire kobolds in order to level up your fireball magic.
Jax: Tomorrow's Fireball Magic skill training is being held at the King's Magic Academy. This training is free, so don't miss it.
Jax: You can get a letter of recommendation from your former teacher Andronicus at the tavern.
Jax: You can find Andronicus at Lillian's Tavern.
Jax: You can buy Sun Crystals directly from the Adventurers Shop so you can have both Fire Crystals and Sun Crystals. If you don't need the Fire Crystals anymore, just sell them.
Jax: Fire kobolds are only found in the Sky Grasslands, so you'll need to go to thereto find them.

all_response:
Jax: There are a total of three steps needed to level up your fireball magic: 1. Attend the advanced fireball magic training held by the magic school tomorrow night at 8pm sharp; 2. After the training, you will also need to have the sun crystal in order to be able to use the advanced fireball magic; 3. In addition to that, you will need to go to the grassland and use the fireball magic to defeat the three fire-attribute kobolds in order to level up your fireball magic.
Jax: Tomorrow's Fireball Magic skill training is held at the King's Magic Academy. You need to pay a fee of 200 gold coins to attend this training.
Jax: Regarding Sun Crystals, you can upgrade your Fire Crystals to Sun Crystals by paying 200 gold coins at the Crystal Research Centre.
Jax: Only the Royal Crystal Research Centre can help you upgrade Fire Crystals.
Jax: If you are short on coins, you can go and defeat the kobolds before coming back to upgrade the crystals. Not only will your victory over the three kobolds help you upgrade your fireball magic, but the Adventurer's Guild will also pay you 150 gold coins for doing so.
Jax: Fire-attribute kobolds are only found in the Sky Prairie, so you need to go to the Sky Prairie to find them.

Then, the students should go to the virtual environment laboratory for practical training in a virtual setting. Finally, your subordinates must attend the emergency first aid skills assessment on time tomorrow night at the hospital.
Jax: You can go to the hospital and ask Doctor Henry to guide your subordinates' training. You have sufficient funds, so don't worry about the cost of training, just pay according to the professor's requirements.

Jax: You should let them take the assessment organized by St. Anne's Hospital. The assessment is free of charge. Please don't miss it.
Jax: The assessment time is 7 PM tomorrow night.

all_response:
Jax: The training process consists of three steps: 1. Invite professional medical personnel for theoretical training and operational demonstrations; 2. Go to the virtual environment lab for practical training in a virtual setting; 3. Have your subordinates attend the first aid skills assessment on time at 7 PM tomorrow night at the hospital.
Jax: You can ask Professor Henry from the hospital to guide your subordinates' training. You need to pay a training fee of 200 gold coins.
Jax: Professor Henry works at the King's Hospital.
Jax: You can take them to the National Virtual Reality Lab to complete the second step of the training. You need to pay a lab usage fee of 200 gold coins.
Jax: The last step is to take them to participate in the assessment organized by St. Anne's Hospital. You need to pay a total of 200 gold coins for the assessment fee for your subordinates.
Jax: You can give the latest model of computer graphics card to the National Virtual Reality Lab, and they will let you use the lab for free, so you will have enough gold coins to complete the task.
